comments.author: Exio.tech
comments.body: Well, I guess you're right. The first is to define the main goal of what's your company doing. The important thing is that if you have a company and your ONLY goal is to make some money, you'll fail. I've seen many people doing this mistake. The second is to have a vision of the steps you must take to reach your goal. And the third important thing is to have another huge goal, so that when you reach the first one your company will still have a motivation to grow. This is of course just a general thing. When you are really starting business nothing is this easyÂ   But I wish it was

comments.author: Abbee
comments.body: First step on how to grow your business is to think ahead of your competitors, focus on your competitors weakness to be your strength.Every business has it ups and downs,but quit when facing certain challenges or when things aren't in your favor, always work to achieve success.Don't be too focus on Money.It's called a business not a charity organization,don't spend your business income or profit lavishly.Be updated, the world is now digitalize. Try to keep up with different technologies and Social Media Channel that can help your business.Treat your customers right, so that there will be a next time.
